name: StaticString
desc: A string type designed to represent text that is known at compile time.

items.name: typealias StaticString.ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType
items.desc: A type that represents an extended grapheme cluster literal.

items.name: typealias StaticString.StringLiteralType
items.desc: A type that represents a string literal.

items.name: typealias StaticString.UnicodeScalarLiteralType
items.desc: A type that represents a Unicode scalar literal.

items.name: init(extendedGraphemeClusterLiteral: StaticString)
items.desc: Creates an instance initialized to a single character that is made up of one or more Unicode scalar values.

items.name: init(stringLiteral: StaticString)
items.desc: Creates an instance initialized to the value of a string literal.

items.name: init(unicodeScalarLiteral: StaticString)
items.desc: Creates an instance initialized to a single Unicode scalar.

items.name: var customMirror: Mirror
items.desc: The custom mirror for this instance.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual representation of the static string, suitable for debugging.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A textual representation of the static string.

items.name: var hasPointerRepresentation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the static string stores a pointer to a null-terminated sequence of UTF-8 code units.

items.name: var isASCII: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the static string represents only ASCII code units (or an ASCII scalar value).

items.name: var utf8CodeUnitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of UTF-8 code units (excluding the null terminator).

items.name: var utf8Start: UnsafePointer<UInt8>
items.desc: A pointer to a null-terminated sequence of UTF-8 code units.

items.name: func withUTF8Buffer<R>((UnsafeBufferPointer<UInt8>) -> R) -> R
items.desc: Invokes the given closure with a buffer containing the static stringâ€™s UTF-8 code unit sequence (excluding the null terminator).
